Connection Interface for receiving OpenLCB messages.

Message Base for all OpenLCB message types Messages (and therefore all subtypes) are immutable once created.
MessageDecoder This class provides a basic double-dispatch mechanism for handling messages.

MessageTypeIdentifier Message Type Identifiers Central place to carry the (only) numerical values for Message Type Identifiers
ProtocolIdentification.Protocols  
 

Package org.openlcb Description

Basic interfaces and classes for a prototype implemention of OpenLCB.

This is not intended as a base for production implementations, but rather a convenient toolset for creating tests and demonstrations of OpenLCB protocols.
